code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faCalendar,faCarSide,faPlus,faClipboardCheck}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{RESERVATION_STEPS,previousStep,changeStep}from'../actions';import{withRouter}from'react-router-dom';var steps=[{key:RESERVATION_STEPS[0].value,icon:faCalendar,title:'Date'},{key:RESERVATION_STEPS[1].value,icon:faCarSide,title:'Vehicele'},{key:RESERVATION_STEPS[2].value,icon:faPlus,title:'Extras'},{key:RESERVATION_STEPS[3].value,icon:faClipboardCheck,title:'Confirm'}];function ReservationStepsState(props){return React.createElement("div",{className:"steps-container"},steps.map(function(x){return React.createElement("div",{className:"step",key:x.key,onClick:function onClick(){props.currentStep.value>x.key&&props.onPreviousStepClick(x.key);}},React.createElement("div",{className:getStepIcon(x.key,props.currentStep.value)},React.createElement("div",{className:"icon-placeholder"},React.createElement(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:x.icon,size:"lg"}))),React.createElement("div",{className:"step-footer"},x.title));}));}var getStepIcon=function getStepIcon(stepValue,currentStepValue){return stepValue===currentStepValue?'active step-circle':'step-circle';};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{onPreviousStepClick:function onPreviousStepClick(index){return dispatch(changeStep(index));}};};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(_ref){var reservationApp=_ref.reservationApp;return{currentStep:reservationApp.currentStep};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ReservationStepsState);
